articles.author: Associated Press Television News
articles.title: How long can I expect a COVID-19 illness to last? - Republic World - Republic World
articles.description: How long can I expect a COVID-19 illness to last? It depends. Most coronavirus patients have mild to moderate illness and recover quickly.
articles.content: How long can I expect a COVID-19 illness to last? It depends. Most coronavirus patients have mild to moderate illness and recover quickly. Older, sicker patients tend to take longer to recover. That … [+1660 chars]

articles.author: FRANCE 24
articles.title: French intensive care patients for coronavirus surpass May peak - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: The number of people being treated in French intensive care units for Covid-19 exceeded 1,500 on Monday for the first time since May 27, authorities said, raising fears of local lockdowns being imposed across the country.
